keyword: how many calories is in a mandarin
title: How Many Calories in a Mandarin?
meta_description: Discover how many calories is in a mandarin, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick nutrition tweaks for this citrus fruit.
h1: How Many Calories in a Mandarin?
assumptions: Medium mandarin orange (~75g edible portion), fresh, raw, peeled.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels for packaged versions.

quick_answer.text: One medium mandarin provides ~40 kcal, mostly from natural sugars and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp sugar for candied peel

faqs.q: How many calories is in a mandarin orange?
faqs.a: About 40 kcal for one medium fresh mandarin.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a mandarin?
faqs.a: Roughly 10 g carbs, including 1.4 g fiber and 8 g natural sugars.

faqs.q: Is a mandarin low in fat or protein?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.2 g fat and 0.6 g protein per medium mandarin.

faqs.q: How does mandarin size affect calories?
faqs.a: Smaller mandarins (~50g) have ~27 kcal; larger (~100g) ~53 kcal.

faqs.q: Are canned mandarins higher in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, in syrup adds 15+ kcal; opt for juice-packed or fresh for lower calories.
